text:
I've written about startups, founders, and thought pieces.

Now, I'm trying something new. For the next 6 weeks, I will take a stab at some creative writing. Here's my one-liner.

Would love to know what you think! 🙂

cc: @_nightsweekends @_buildspace https://t.co/8zGaWBTG2b
